entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the evening. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
